issue.title: [C++] Add tests for non-contiguous tensors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4320](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4320). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I would like to add some test cases for tensors with non-contiguous strides.

comments.body:
